text: Wathi kananjalo: “Hini na boonyana bam! Nize ningangeni ngesangoelinye, kokomazeningenengamasangoahlukeneyo, yaye andingekhe ndinincede nganto ngokuchasene noAllâh konke-konke. Inene! Isigqibo sixhomekeke kuAllâh kuphela, Mna ndibeka ithemba lam kuYe, yaye bonke abo bakholwayo mababeke ithemba labo kuYe.”
